text: The secret list at Goldman/JPM is the 'grey list,' you don't put potential M+A deals on the restricted list for very, very, very obvious reasons. You can be on the restricted list for simple advisory work, or debt underwriting or secondaries or putting together a 10[b]-5 plan.
text_html: The secret list at Goldman/JPM is the 'grey list,' you don't put potential M+A deals on the restricted list for very, very, very obvious reasons. You can be on the restricted list for simple advisory work, or debt underwriting or secondaries or putting together a 10[b]-5 plan.

text: Theresa May’s lead Brexit negotiator Olly Robbins is to join Goldman Sachs as a managing director in the investment banking division. He will begin his role after undertaking a sabbatical at the University of Oxford.
text_html: Theresa May’s lead Brexit negotiator Olly Robbins is to join Goldman Sachs as a managing director in the investment banking division. He will begin his role after undertaking a sabbatical at the University of Oxford.

text: I marvel that Goldman Sachs considers "a life-long civil servant" will be able to adjust to private sector work. It's his contacts they want. Olly Robbins essentially becomes a lobbyist. I'm curious, what criteria does the Advisory Committee on Business Appointments consider?

text: Goldman Sachs is in talks to buy French budget hotelier B&B Hotels from PAI Partners in a €2bn deal. It is understood to be Goldman's second foray into the hotel industry, having joined forces with two US hedge funds to help save Travelodge from the brink of collapse in 2012.

text:
Goldman Sachs CEO David Solomon, aka DJ D-Sol, called start to the year "muted." 

M&A saved Goldman from another trading slump. A 51% jump in advisory fees helped investment banking revenue inch up 1% to $1.8 billion. Equities sales and trading revenue of $1.77 billion missed. pic.twitter.com/G7PVYxQHeQ
